mapper.select: select no, subject, userid, hit, to_char(writedate, 'MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from freeboard order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(no, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate, ip) values(a_sq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{userid}, 0, sysdate, #{ip})
mapper.select: select no, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate from freeboard where no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update freeboard set hit=hit+1 where no=#{param1}
update freeboard set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no=#{no} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from freeboard where no=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
